Configuration.Name: L1=10m_L2=5m_central_apx_10_KM_new
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 4800 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g4' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 94.68 config.beamcenterz = 95.81
config.drive()
